questions.dialogueText: So want to go Bonnaroo eh?  Yeaahh I’ve been to every Roo since 2002.
questions.questionText: It’s a magical world of music, fun, and friendship.

questions.dialogueText: In my early days, I used to love sittin’ out in nature. With only the essentials and a fresh warm breeze. Now that I’m older, I’ve opted for a life of cool air and cozy couches.
questions.questionText: What kind of comfort are you looking for?

answers.answerText: I’m not above using an outhouse and the elements never bothered me much.
answers.outcome: Green horn eh? Well I can’t

answers.answerText: I’m bringing extra coin to make sure I get a cool, clean, and comfortable spot to lounge
answers.outcome: Oh you’ll be cozy when you’re hangin’ with your pals or watching live streams from the stages.

answers.answerText: I’ll spare no expense. I’m looking for the royal treatment.
answers.outcome: And a royal treatment it is! Everything from exclusive festival gifts to complimentary messages

questions.dialogueText: I hear they have quite the set of performers this year. I’m bringing extra coin to get as close and exclusive to action as I can.
questions.questionText: How close do you plan on getting to the action?

answers.answerText: Not, me. I’m happy to be in the thick of it with regular folk.
answers.outcome: Shoulder to shoulder with the most passionate of festival goers, I like it.

answers.answerText: Yeah it should be a hoot.  A few dedicated viewing areas does sound nice.
answers.outcome: It’s a nice view up on that hill.

answers.answerText: I hear you, partner. I want to be right up at that stage for every show, and special transport to get me around quick!
answers.outcome: Hah! Dedicated lines, golf cart shuttles, close up views. I’m right there with ya!

questions.dialogueText: But when it comes to the food and drink. I never skip on the premium experience.
questions.questionText: Tell me friend, what’s your price for a decent meal and drink?

answers.answerText: I can fend for myself, thanks.
answers.outcome: Not to worry, you’ll still have plenty of food and drink vendors!

answers.answerText: I suppose I could go for some dedicated food services and a private bar.
answers.outcome: Everybody likes to be waited on from time to time.

answers.answerText: Complimentary snacks, drinks, and catered meals...That does sound nice.
answers.outcome: Why worry about anything when someone else will take care of you!

questions.dialogueText: Hmmmm well I think I've got just the suggestion for you partner. You don't have to take my advice, but I think I may know what you're looking for.
questions.questionText: Want to check out the catalogue?

answers.answerText: Hmmm, I'd like to Start Over
I know what I want, take me straight to purchase
